content.rendered:
The Reid Armchair r is beautifully upholstered in the finest vintage faux leather and finished with diamond stitching.  Stackable up to 5 high.

The frame is made from raw steel, then powder coated for a chic industrial style and the leather gives a vintage look. Ideal for restaurants, bars, hotels and indoor venues.

Held in stock for delivery in 2-3 working days. Suitable for commercial use.

This chair pairs well with our industrial tables.

Please note, this item may require basic self assembly.
